entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: Ree-Yees asked you to help him with some missing items, things that were stolen from the palace. After doing so he gave you permission to enter the palace and speak with Ephant Mon.
entries.journal_entry_description: There are plenty of people who live or work in Jabba's Palace who need things done. You're the person to do those things.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Ree-Yees is the official inventory keeper for Jabba's Palace. He wants you to find a bell that was stolen from Jabba and sold to Valarian. Kill Valarian's underlings until you find the one that has the bell.
entries.task01_comm_message_text: Jabba's missing a ledger containing valuable information. It was stolen by one of Valarian's spies, and he demands it be returned. Find the thug that has it. It shouldn't take long.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Jabba's missing a ledger containing valuable information. He's certain that it was stolen by one of Valarian's spies, and he demands that the book be returned. It's already been passed off, so while one team takes care of the spy, you will find the book.
entries.task03_comm_message_text: Jabba had a prototype warhead in the garage. Barada says it's missing. I don't think this is Valarian's work, it's too big. Jabba says it's probably a group called the Sennex. Find it!
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Find the Sennex pirates and see who's stolen the warhead. If they figure out how to arm it there could be trouble for more than just Jabba.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Return to Jabba's Palace and speak with Ree-Yees.
